title: Playwright
description: Modern end-to-end testing framework by Microsoft. Supports multiple browsers with a single API.

title: Jest
description: Delightful JavaScript testing framework with a focus on simplicity. Works with React, Vue, Angular, and more.

title: Selenium
description: Browser automation framework for web application testing. Supports multiple programming languages and browsers.

title: Cypress
description: Fast, easy and reliable testing for anything that runs in a browser. Modern end-to-end testing framework.

title: Postman
description: API development and testing platform with powerful collaboration features for teams.

title: Apache JMeter
description: Open-source load testing tool for analyzing and measuring performance of various services.
